T02TD2550E:19a-0: @19a * // 'phags pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2550E:19a-1: mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i rnal 'byor bas ci za ba'i zas kyi rnal 'byor 'di ltar bya'o //
T02TD2550E:19a-2: gang yang zas kyi dngos po stong par bsams te /
T02TD2550E:19a-3: aom aa k'a ro mu kham sarba dharm'a n'am a'a dya nu tpanna tv'a ta sv'a h'a /
T02TD2550E:19a-4: zhes pas dag par bsams la /
T02TD2550E:19a-5: a'a: yongs su gyur pa las bdud rtsi dkar po dri ma med pa dang /
T02TD2550E:19a-6: aom yongs su gyur pa las mang zhing spel ba dang /
T02TD2550E:19a-7: h'um gis ye shes kyi bdud rtsi drangs te /
T02TD2550E:19a-8: bdag gi lce rdo rjer bsams la /
T02TD2550E:19a-9: lus ngag yid gsum byin gyis brlabs te /
T02TD2550E:19a-10: snying gar lha tshogs gsal btab la dang por dkon mchog mchod /
T02TD2550E:19a-11: de nas lha tshogs ci rigs par mchod la /
T02TD2550E:19a-12: rang gi lus kyi lha tshogs tshim par byas la /
T02TD2550E:19a-13: lhag ma 'byung po kun la sbyin no //
T02TD2550E:19b-0: mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i zas kyi @19b rnal 'byor slob dpon 'jam dpal bshes gnyen gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so//
